Hello

Thanks for letting us know about your condition, however, this sort of thing 
is better discussed off-list, as it has nothning to do with our content. 
Sorry, but rules are rules. I've also noticed you did the same thing for the 
Spy Division and the PeaceMaker list-- please refrain in those areas, as 
well.

Thanks for understanding.

--M.
